name: Elliott Advisors (UK) Limited
bossPosition: Assistant General Counsel, Senior EU & Compliance Counsel
goal: Elliott provides, among other things, investment advisory services. Elliott uses a global investment approach in a number areas including securities, commodities trading, fixed-income positions, performing debt, equity oriented positions, real estate, and portfolio protection.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Regional Policy, Taxation
euInitiatives: As part of a global organisation Elliott seeks to keep abreast of legislation which may affect its operations, or the operations of its affiliates. Legislation currently of interest to Elliott includes, but is not limited to, MiFID II, GDPR, and other directives, regulations, and legislation which may affect the financial services and energy sectors, as well as Elliottâ€™s other business interests.
